description: Step this way please for our 10 best starter recipes. Start your night off with any one of our crave-worthy appetizers

submenu.name: Cheese Balls
submenu.description: Cheese puffs, cheese curls, cheese balls, cheesy puffs, corn curls, or corn cheese are a puffed corn snack, coated with a mixture of cheese or cheese-flavored powders. They are manufactured by extruding heated corn dough through a die that forms the particular shape. They may be ball-shaped, curly ("cheese curls"), straight, or irregularly shaped. Puffcorn is a similar food, without cheese flavoring.

submenu.name: Veg Cutlet
submenu.description: Directions. Place the potatoes, carrot, green beans, and peas in a pot with enough water to cover. Mix the egg, 3/4 cup bread crumbs, garam masala, cayenne pepper, and salt into the bowl with the mashed vegetables. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat, and fry the coated patties until golden brown.
